channel.title: [BIG LIST] Of Things I Need To Fix/Add On My Server!
channel.description:
1. On my server, its impossible to get skulled. Players keep 3 items+ no matter what. I want it to be like 2005 Runescape. Skull= Lose all.
2. How do I change General Graddor's healing frequency to lower? Because it heals way too much, and it heals over his max hp. How do I change it so he can't heal to like 50000 Hp?
3. How do I figure out what items will lose on death? I have the "item kept on death" button, but it can't be opened up.
4. How do I add ava effect? picks up arrows.
5. My server have void, but how do I know if it has the effect?
6. How do i add specs on Npcs?
7. How do I speed up the dragon claws spec? Its a little slow.
8. How do I add the Dark Bow specs+graphics. Right now, it shoots out ghosts when you spec. -.-
9. How do I add Dragon Arrows to match up with Dark bow+Effects?
10. How do I change the client background?
11. How do I add the other godwar bosses except for General Graddor? And with the animations. Right now, my general gradoor's arms become invisible when it moves.
12. How do I change some items store price to PK Points? I added pvp armour, and was going to add them to the PK Point store. But it comes up as coins worth.
13. How do I add range void effect? Or where do I check if its already added?
Adding More.

item.title: [BIG LIST] Of Things I Need To Fix/Add On My Server!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Dcrew Mod Dcrew
item.description:
@Mod_Dcrew wrote:

Add my msn I can fix all those: dcrew@live.co.uk

Read full topic

item.title: [BIG LIST] Of Things I Need To Fix/Add On My Server!
item.dc:creator: @Feel_No_Pain Feel No Pain
item.description:
@Feel_No_Pain wrote:

  1. On my server, its impossible to get skulled. Players keep 3 items+ no matter what. I want it to be like 2005 Runescape. Skull= Lose all.

  2. How do I change General Graddor’s healing frequency to lower? Because it heals way too much, and it heals over his max hp. How do I change it so he can’t heal to like 50000 Hp?

  3. How do I figure out what items will lose on death? I have the “item kept on death” button, but it can’t be opened up.

  4. How do I add ava effect? picks up arrows.

  5. My server have void, but how do I know if it has the effect?

  6. How do i add specs on Npcs?

  7. How do I speed up the dragon claws spec? Its a little slow.

  8. How do I add the Dark Bow specs+graphics. Right now, it shoots out ghosts when you spec. -.-

  9. How do I add Dragon Arrows to match up with Dark bow+Effects?

  10. How do I change the client background?

  11. How do I add the other godwar bosses except for General Graddor? And with the animations. Right now, my general gradoor’s arms become invisible when it moves.

  12. How do I change some items store price to PK Points? I added pvp armour, and was going to add them to the PK Point store. But it comes up as coins worth.

  13. How do I add range void effect? Or where do I check if its already added?

Adding More.

Read full topic
